timeline.bodyText: Change to CpmStarBidder
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: Please, change all *CPM* to *Cpm*
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Check RequestValidator#validate method. Unlike Go, we have some validation for all openrtb2 requests.
This check is redundant.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: We don't have any obligation for usage of final keyword in for. (But I prefer keep it clean)
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: See Result.emptyWithError
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Json.mapper.convertValue can produce IllegalArgumentException.
Catch it and throw PrebidException (see RhythmoneBidder#parseAndValidateImpExt) for example.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Please, change variable name to 'impExt'.
Now this is not a problem, but then, a new field may be added with ext (extension)
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: They insert ext.bidder to ext. You just check for null and rewrite same data.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
This method do too much.
Parse + Validate + CreateImp.
I suggesting just returning ExtImpCPMStar and perform validation.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: This can be inlined in makeHttpRequests
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Usually, they gather all exception, and pass mutable list through methods; this is the only way to preserve this logic.
But keep in mind, that it is bad approach.
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: In go, they do not collect all exception (but some bidder does). They return the first comer, so you can simply throw Excpetion and catch it above.
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
Rename to resolveBidType
We don't use get*
timeline.author: DGarbar
DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: probably subPoolId is more clearer
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: final
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: take out and name it appropriate to make more cleaner
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: You write two times to .banner
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: pull .ext on second line
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: take out  bidCustomizer.apply(Bid.builder()).build() to make it more readable
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
In go, this test will fail.
we receive only first exception message
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: This test is redundant. (We don't have any logic which concerns width and height in bidder)
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: This test is redundant. (We don't have any logic which concerns this)
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: makeBidsShouldReturnErrorWhenBidHaveNotSupportedBidType
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: makeBidsShouldReturnErrorWhenNoCorrespondingId
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: absolutely identical to makeBidsShouldReturnErrorWithUnknownBidTypeIfDiffId
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText:
absolutely identical tomakeBidsShouldReturnNativeBidIfNativeIsPresentInRequestImp
Change one to test for Video, or multiple mismatch ids
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: Encode in Base64 corresponding bidder
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: remove
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.message: CpmStar Bidder, functional issues fixed, code cleanup, tests fix

timeline.bodyText: You don't need that variable now
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: make givenImp(impBuilder -> impBuilder to have style consistency
timeline.author: DGarbar

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/test/java/org/prebid/server/bidder/cpmstar/CpmStarBidderTest.java b/src/test/java/org/prebid/server/bidder/cpmstar/CpmStarBidderTest.java
index 76a50a1d9..a9190c92c 100644
--- a/src/test/java/org/prebid/server/bidder/cpmstar/CpmStarBidderTest.java
+++ b/src/test/java/org/prebid/server/bidder/cpmstar/CpmStarBidderTest.java

@@ -71,12 +70,11 @@ public class CpmStarBidderTest extends VertxTest {
     public void makeHttpRequestsShouldSkipInvalidImpressionAndAddError() {
         // given
         final ExtPrebid<?, ExtImpCpmStar> ext = ExtPrebid.of(null, ExtImpCpmStar.of(12, 132));
-        final Imp bannerImp = givenImp(
-                impBuilder -> impBuilder
-                        .banner(null)
-                        .id("2")
-                        .ext(mapper.valueToTree(ext))
-                        .banner(Banner.builder().w(300).h(400).build())
+        final Imp bannerImp = givenImp(impBuilder -> impBuilder
+                .banner(null)
+                .id("2")
+                .ext(mapper.valueToTree(ext))
+                .banner(Banner.builder().w(300).h(400).build())
         );
         final Imp audioImp = givenImp(impBuilder -> impBuilder
                 .banner(null)

timeline.bodyText: Identical to makeBidsShouldReturnErrorWhenNoCorrespondingId
timeline.author: DGarbar

timeline.bodyText: Name method appropriately
timeline.author: DGarbar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -245,7 +200,7 @@ public void makeBidsShouldReturnBannerBidIfBannerIsPresentInRequestImp() throws

         final HttpCall<BidRequest> httpCall = givenHttpCall(
                 BidRequest.builder()

timeline.message: Fix usersync url to use https
